Metadata.title: VideoFit: Workout video timer app, gym video log & workout tracker for calisthenics, handstands, yoga and weightlifting
Metadata.description: Film yourself, check your form and track your progress with VideoFit. We include a video timer with countdown for your holds and a calendar to track your workouts over time. Instant video playback so you can review your form right after your set.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: VideoFit ("the App") is provided by us as a free tool. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle your information when you use the App.

informationWeCollect.title: 1. Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.content: We do not collect, store, or share any personal or non-personal information from users of the App. All activities take place entirely on your device.

devicePermissions.title: 2. Device Permissions
devicePermissions.content: The App may request access to certain features on your device, such as the camera, microphone, or storage, in order to record or analyze video content. This access is used solely for functionality within the App and no data is uploaded, stored externally, or shared with anyone.

useOfInformation.title: 3. Use of Your Information
useOfInformation.content: Since we do not collect any information, we do not use your data for analytics, marketing, or any other purpose.

thirdPartyServices.title: 4. Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.content: The App does not use any third-party services (such as analytics tools, advertising networks, or SDKs) that collect data from you.

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: Although no data is transmitted or stored externally, we are committed to maintaining a high level of security and privacy in all future versions of the App. If any new features require data handling, this policy will be updated accordingly.

childrensPrivacy.title: 6. Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.content: The App is not directed toward children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe a child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so we can remove it.

changesToPolicy.title: 7. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changesToPolicy.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make changes, the updated version will be available within the App or on our official website. Significant changes will be clearly communicated to users.

contactUs.title: 8. Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.

Hero.mainTitle: Record yourself. Check your form. Track your progress.
Hero.subtitle: There is nothing like seeing yourself in action to improve in a sports discipline.
Hero.description: VideoFit is a free workout video recorder, timer and tracker for iOS and Android. Whether you train calisthenics, handstands, yoga, weightlifting or any other discipline, VideoFit will help you improve your form and technique.
